name: Unrefined Stone
description: Weak stone taken straight from the ground.

name: Refined Stone
description: Stone that has been refined into a stronger form.

name: Dull Wood Stick
description: A practically useless stick. Do you really want this?

name: Raptor Leg
description: Mmm... tasty! Wait, is this safe to eat?

name: Beach Rock
description: Some weak rocks found on the beach. Useful for crafting.

name: Drift Wood
description: Weak sticks washed ashore from old trees. Useful for crafting.

name: Campfire
description: The crowning achievement of man: a sustainable source of warmth and hope. What will the dinosaurs think?

name: Berry
description: Random berry for eating, don't know the effects though.

name: Raft
description: The thing you have been waiting for. ESCAPE NOW!
